A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Perhaps the worst film ever created by Hollywood.  Rian Johnson and Disney Studios accomplished what they intended........effectively destroying the Star Wars franchise.  It is the typical \"Twister Genre\" film....one with so many special effects that they do not include a plot.  Rian Johnson should be ashamed of itself and the critics who praise this POS either were paid off by Disney to write the good reviews (I wonder if Disney can deduct that as cost of sales on its tax return) or are mentally retarded.  Either way\, I am now boycotting all Disney products and entertainment (save ESPN).
